pagesJson.heading: Contact Wildflowers & Co
pagesJson.content:
Hello!

Whether you're planning a large-scale wedding, corporate event or an intimate dinner, we're here to bring your floral vision to life.

As a full-service florist studio specializing in seasonal floral design, we travel throughout Toronto, the GTA and beyond. Visit us in studio (we're happy to look over mood boards!) for a consultation on how we can deliver flowers that capture your event theme and style.

We'd love to work with you!

- Susanne of Wildflowers

meta.description: Reach out to us for a quote on the cost of wedding flowers or to ask about floral design services for your next event. We'd love to help!
meta.title: Contact
